channel.title: Cant make cb lower then 141

item.title: Cant make cb lower then 141
item.dc:creator: @pk_blooder pk_blooder
item.description:
@pk_blooder wrote:

i lowered formula max cb went to 141 but i tried to lower more and it doesnt lower anymoreâ€¦ i got this

		int combatLevel = 0;
		if (ran > attstr) {
			combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875));
		} else if (mag > attstr) {
			combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875));
		} else {
			combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325));
		}
